page.title: 06Home Life Pet's Survey
page.content: 40 families told us about their pets Do you have a pet? Yes 29 No 11. What sort pets do you have? Dog 10,Cat 6,Fish 4,Budgie 5,Rabbit 4. Is your pet helpful? 15 families said yes 14 families said no Have you ever taken your pet to the vet? 21 families said yes 8 families said no. {Beatrice }My Pets The youngest of our dogs is a chocolate labrador,the other dog is a terrier called Barley. Barley runs away because she can get under the gate. When my mother goes outside with the dogs she says,"Now where has that dog gone?" Then we have to go and look for the dog,and when we get back the dog is curled up in her basket.
